title: Load authentication page successfully
description: Verifies that the authentication (login/registration) page loads and shows core UI elements.

title: Login with valid credentials and reach dashboard
description: Verifies a user can log in with valid credentials and is taken to the dashboard/protected area.

title: Login fails with incorrect password
description: Verifies an incorrect password shows a visible error message and the user stays on the auth page.

title: Login fails with non-existent user
description: Verifies a non-existent account cannot log in and a visible error is shown.

title: Client-side validation: attempt login with empty fields
description: Verifies the UI prevents submission or shows validation when email and password are empty.

title: Client-side validation: invalid email format
description: Verifies entering an invalid email format shows a visible validation error.

title: Password field can be masked
description: Verifies the password input is masked in the UI for privacy.

title: Create a new transaction from the Transactions page and see it appear in the table
description: Verifies a user can add a new transaction and the newly created row is visible in the transaction record table.

steps.description: Click on "Add transaction" (or equivalent create button).
Verify text "Test Seller A" is visible in the transactions table.
Verify text "Test Buyer A" is visible in the transactions table.

title: Edit an existing transaction and verify updated values in the table
description: Verifies a user can edit a transaction row and the table reflects the updated field values.

steps.description: Click on the "Edit" action for the first transaction row.
Fill "Notes" with "Updated notes for edit test".
Verify text "Updated notes for edit test" is visible in the transactions table.

title: Delete an existing transaction and verify it is removed from the table
description: Verifies a user can delete a transaction and the corresponding row is no longer visible in the table.

steps.description: Click on the first transaction row to focus it (or open its row actions).
Verify element "Delete" is visible for the selected row.
Click on "Delete" for the selected row.
Click on "Confirm" in the delete confirmation.
Verify text "Transaction deleted" (or equivalent success message) is visible.

title: Validation: prevent saving a transaction with missing required fields
description: Verifies required-field validation is shown when trying to save an incomplete transaction.

steps.description: Click on "Add transaction" (or equivalent create button).
Verify text "Seller is required" (or equivalent required field message) is visible.

title: Switch language to Bengali from Settings and see Bengali UI on Dashboard
description: Verifies a logged-in user can switch to Bengali and the Dashboard UI updates to Bengali text.

steps.description: Click on "Settings" in the main navigation/menu
Select "Bengali" from the language dropdown (or click the Bengali language option)

title: Language preference persists after refresh on Dashboard
description: Verifies the selected language remains Bengali after a page refresh during the same session.

steps.description: Click on "Settings" in the main navigation/menu
Select "Bengali" from the language dropdown (or click the Bengali language option)
Press "Enter" to trigger any save/apply action if the UI requires confirmation

title: Switch language back to English from Settings and see English UI on Dashboard
description: Verifies a logged-in user can switch back to English and the Dashboard UI updates accordingly.

steps.description: Click on "Settings" in the main navigation/menu
Select "English" from the language dropdown (or click the English language option)

title: Unsupported language selection is rejected and language remains unchanged
description: Verifies the UI prevents or rejects an unsupported language and keeps the previously selected language.

steps.description: Click on "Settings" in the main navigation/menu
Attempt to select "French" (fr) from the language dropdown, if available

title: Unsupported language attempt does not change the displayed language on Settings
description: Verifies that after an unsupported language attempt, the Settings page still shows the previous language selection.

steps.description: Click on "Settings" in the main navigation/menu
Attempt to select "French" (fr) from the language dropdown, if available

title: Bengali translation appears for at least one common UI label on Dashboard
description: Verifies that after switching to Bengali, at least one standard label on Dashboard is displayed in Bengali script.

steps.description: Click on "Settings" in the main navigation/menu
Select "Bengali" from the language dropdown (or click the Bengali language option)
Click on "Dashboard" in the main navigation/menu

title: English translation appears for at least one common UI label after switching to English
description: Verifies that after switching to English, the UI shows English labels again.

steps.description: Click on "Settings" in the main navigation/menu
Select "English" from the language dropdown (or click the English language option)
Click on "Dashboard" in the main navigation/menu

title: Change font size to Large and see it applied on Profile
description: Verifies a signed-in user can set font size to Large and the Profile UI reflects the larger font size.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the username or email field
Verify element "Profile" is visible in the main navigation or user menu
Verify text "Profile" is visible on the page
Select "Large" from the font size setting dropdown

title: Font size change persists after page refresh (Large)
description: Verifies the selected font size persists on refresh, indicating the preference is stored and re-applied.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the username or email field
Select "Large" from the font size setting dropdown
Wait for text "Font size" to be visible

title: Switch from Large to Small and see UI update
description: Verifies the user can change font size from Large to Small and the UI reflects the smaller text styling.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the username or email field
Select "Large" from the font size setting dropdown
Select "Small" from the font size setting dropdown
Verify text "Small" is visible as the selected font size value

title: Cancel/close font size control without changing selection
description: Verifies closing the settings area without selecting a new size leaves the current selection unchanged.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the username or email field

title: Invalid font size value is rejected and previous setting remains
description: Verifies invalid font size input is not accepted and the previously selected font size stays applied.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the username or email field
Select "Medium" from the font size setting dropdown
Click into the font size input (if editable) and type "xxl"

title: After invalid font size attempt, Profile still shows previous selection
description: Verifies that after an invalid attempt, navigating away and returning keeps the last valid font size selection.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the username or email field
Select "Medium" from the font size setting dropdown
Click into the font size input (if editable) and type "xxl"

title: Font size setting remains when returning to Profile from another area
description: Verifies the chosen font size remains consistent when navigating within the app and coming back to Profile.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the username or email field
Select "Large" from the font size setting dropdown

title: Large font size does not break key Profile text visibility
description: Verifies key Profile content remains visible and readable after setting font size to Large.

steps.description: Type "{{LOGIN_USER}}" into the username or email field
Select "Large" from the font size setting dropdown

title: Use on-screen keypad to enter a simple addition and view the computed result
description: Verifies the built-in calculator keypad can input a basic expression and display the correct result.

steps.description: Navigate to the calculator screen from the application’s main entry page.
Click on "1" on the on-screen numeric keypad.
Click on "+" on the on-screen keypad.
Click on "2" on the on-screen numeric keypad.

title: Keypad supports decimals and multiplication with a correct formatted result
description: Verifies decimal entry and multiplication compute correctly and render a reasonable numeric output.

steps.description: Navigate to the calculator screen from the application’s main entry page.
Click on "7" on the on-screen numeric keypad.
Click on "." on the on-screen keypad.
Click on "5" on the on-screen numeric keypad.
Click on "×" on the on-screen keypad.
Click on "2" on the on-screen numeric keypad.

title: Clear resets the current expression and result display
description: Verifies the clear action removes previously entered input and resets the display state.

steps.description: Navigate to the calculator screen from the application’s main entry page.
Click on "9" on the on-screen numeric keypad.

title: Backspace deletes the last entered character
description: Verifies the calculator can remove the last digit/operator using backspace/delete control.

steps.description: Navigate to the calculator screen from the application’s main entry page.
Click on "1" on the on-screen numeric keypad.
Click on "2" on the on-screen numeric keypad.

title: Malformed expression entry is blocked or shows a visible error state
description: Verifies the UI prevents or clearly errors on malformed numeric expressions such as repeated decimals.

steps.description: Navigate to the calculator screen from the application’s main entry page.
Click on "1" on the on-screen numeric keypad.
Click on "5" on the on-screen numeric keypad.
Click on "." on the on-screen keypad.
Click on "." on the on-screen keypad.

title: Expression evaluator computes a complex market-style expression via the UI (if available)
description: Verifies a complex expression can be entered and evaluated end-to-end from the UI and a numeric result is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the calculator screen from the application’s main entry page.
Type "15.700 * 0.95 * 120 * 1.02" into the calculator expression input field.

title: Calculator result can be sent into a transaction input field (feed into form)
description: Verifies the calculator output can be applied to a transaction-related input field from the UI.

steps.description: Navigate to a screen that contains both a transaction input field and access to the built-in calculator.
Click on "2" on the on-screen numeric keypad.
Click on "0" on the on-screen numeric keypad.
Click on "Use" / "Apply" (the control that inserts the calculator result into the transaction input).
Verify text "20" is visible in the target transaction input field.

title: Cancel/close calculator does not overwrite an existing transaction input value
description: Verifies dismissing the calculator leaves the current transaction field unchanged unless explicitly applied.

steps.description: Navigate to a screen that contains a transaction input field and access to the built-in calculator.
Type "999" into the transaction input field.
Verify text "999" is visible in the transaction input field.
Click on "Calculator" to open the calculator panel/modal.
Click on "1" on the on-screen numeric keypad.
Click on "Close" / "Cancel" to dismiss the calculator without applying.
Verify text "999" is visible in the transaction input field.

description: Verifies that the dashboard does not show a generic visible error state when the user is authenticated.

description: Verifies that a user with incorrect credentials cannot access the dashboard and sees a visible login error.

description: Verifies the transaction list area renders with recognizable table columns/headers and at least one row when data exists.

Verify element "A transaction row" is visible
